description: AI assisted commit message generation. Never suffer through writing commit messages again.
configuration.title: Git Commit Genie
category.title: Git Commit Genie
views.activitybar.title: Git Commit Genie
command.toggleChain: Git Commit Genie: Enable/Disable thinking mode
command.viewRepositoryAnalysis: Git Commit Genie: View Repository Analysis
command.refreshRepositoryAnalysis: Git Commit Genie: Refresh Repository Analysis
command.cancelRepositoryAnalysis: Git Commit Genie: Stop Repository Analysis
command.showRepositoryCost: Git Commit Genie: Show Repository Cost
command.resetRepositoryCost: Git Commit Genie: Reset Repository Cost
config.autoStageAllForDiff.desc: Only when the staging area is empty: temporarily stage all changes to build the diff, then restore your staging state. Use with caution—this may include unrelated changes in the prompt.
config.chain.enabled.desc: Enable multi-step chain prompting for commit generation (It makes the generated commit messages more detailed and accurate, and better aligns with the user's template, but it will increase latency and token consumption).
config.chain.maxParallelNew.desc: Maximum parallel LLM calls used by chain prompting across all providers. Increase carefully to avoid provider rate limits.
config.llm.maxRetries.desc: Max retry attempts for API request failures.
config.repositoryAnalysis.enabled.desc: Enable repository analysis to provide better context for commit message generation.
config.repositoryAnalysis.excludePattern: File patterns to exclude from repository analysis scanning.
config.repositoryAnalysis.updateThreshol: Number of commits after which to update the repository analysis.
config.repositoryAnalysis.model.desc: Model used for repository analysis. When a specific model is selected, its provider is used automatically for analysis. Choose 'Use general provider model' to reuse your main commit message model.
config.commitLanguage.desc: Target language for generated commit messages.
config.typingAnimationSpeed.desc: Speed of the commit message box typing animation in milliseconds per character. Set to -1 to disable the animation.
config.showUsageCost.desc: When enabled, a brief notification will displays the estimated total cost for the current generation.
config.ui.stageNotifications.enabled.des: Show bottom-right stage notifications during chain prompting.
templates.chooseLocation: Choose where to save the template
templates.renameExists: A template with that name already exists.
